Dublin City University: Dublin City University (abbreviated as DCU) (Irish: Ollscoil Chathair Bhaile √Åtha Cliath[1]) is a university based on the Northside of Dublin, Ireland. Created as the National Institute for Higher Education, Dublin in 1975, it enrolled its first students in 1980, and was elevated to university status (along with the NIHE Limerick, now the University of Limerick) in September 1989 by statute.
